definition: to carry out a vendetta against sb
hatred/animosity/enmity/foe/enemy/to feel animosity toward (the wealthy, foreigners etc)

sentences.english: Reports indicated that at the time he was once again seeking revenge against the "good" Doctor.
sentences.chinese: 有报告显示当时他再度向那位“好”医生寻仇。

definition: to pick a quarrel/to start a fight
to start a feud/to become enemies
to send punitive forces against/(fig.) to criticize violently
to take revenge and wipe out a grudge (idiom)
to kill sb to prevent them from divulging a secret/to silence sb
to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
for every grievance someone is responsible, for every debt there is a debtor (idiom)/when settling disputes one should not involve third parties
pinyin: yuan1 you3 tou2 , zhai4 you3 zhu3

definition: to break into jail/to forcibly release prisoners
